faultTypeRule.ocl: VariableDeclarationFragment.allInstances()->select(varWithLiteralInitialization | --Scope Conditions let lit: ASTNode = varWithLiteralInitialization.variablesContainer.fragments->asOrderedSet()->last().initializer in lit <> null and (lit.oclIsKindOf(StringLiteral) or lit.oclIsKindOf(CharacterLiteral) or lit.oclIsKindOf(NumberLiteral) or lit.oclIsKindOf(BooleanLiteral)) ) ->reject(node: ASTNode | node.originalCompilationUnit.oclIsUndefined()) ->reject(node: ASTNode | node->closure(oclContainer())->exists(oclIsKindOf(Javadoc)))
